actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-883.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of S. 2012, making in order amendments thereto, providing for motion to insist on House amendments and request a conference with the Senate.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S.2012 (assistance for Central America and the Caribbean).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of S. 2012, making in order amendments thereto, providing for motion to insist on House amendments and request a conference with the Senate.
